text: The Panathinaiko Stadium is a stadium in Athens, Greece. The Olympic Games of 1896 and 2004 were held here. The London 2012 Olympics started here. It is the only major stadium in the world built entirely of white marble. It is also one of the oldest in the world. Category:Olympic venues Category:Stadiums in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Athens
title: Panathenaic Stadium
